name: AMAS Development Environment
postCreateCommand: echo 'Running postCreate setup...' && (test -f .devcontainer/setup.sh && chmod +x .devcontainer/setup.sh || true) && timeout 300 .devcontainer/setup.sh postCreate || { echo 'Error: setup.sh not found or failed'; exit 1; }
onCreateCommand: echo 'Running onCreate setup...' && (test -f .devcontainer/setup.sh && chmod +x .devcontainer/setup.sh && timeout 300 .devcontainer/setup.sh onCreate || { echo 'Warning: setup.sh not found, continuing...'; exit 0; }) || exit 0
updateContentCommand: echo 'Running updateContent setup...' && (test -f .devcontainer/setup.sh && chmod +x .devcontainer/setup.sh || true) && timeout 300 .devcontainer/setup.sh updateContent || { echo 'Error: setup.sh not found or failed'; exit 1; }
postStartCommand: echo 'Dev container ready. Services on ports 8000 (FastAPI) and 8080 (Dashboard).'
